docs(bmad): add Session 2025-11-10N - Render deployment fix complete

Documented successful resolution of 20+ consecutive deployment failures.

**Session Summary:**
- Root cause: Branching migration conflict (d37ed4cd3013 and 36b3e62b4148)
- Fix 1: Added postgresql_using clauses for UUID‚ÜíString conversions
- Fix 2: Corrected migration order (d37ed4cd3013 now runs after 36b3e62b4148)
- Result: Deployment LIVE (commit 64ad4fb)

**Deployment Status:**
‚úÖ Backend: https://ma-saas-backend.onrender.com/health ‚Üí healthy
‚úÖ Database: 165 tables, migration at HEAD (dc2c0f69c1b1)
‚úÖ All 18 migrations applied in correct order

**Test Coverage:**
- Backend: 681/755 passing (90.2%)
- Frontend: ~1,066 passing (99.7%)

This resolves the critical P0 blocker preventing all deployments since October 30.

docs(migrations): document d37ed4cd3013 FK type mismatch resolution

Comprehensive documentation of migration fix deployed in commit 3d15ca6.

**Documentation Updates:**

1. **UUID_CONVERSION_STRATEGY.md**
   - Added resolution section at top documenting the fix
   - Changed status from "CRITICAL - Blocking" to "‚úÖ RESOLVED"
   - Detailed problem, root cause, fix applied, and deployment status
   - Preserved historical context for reference

2. **BMAD_PROGRESS_TRACKER.md**
   - Added Session 2025-11-10F documenting migration fix work
   - Included problem statement, root cause analysis, fix details
   - Listed all 5 FK columns converted from UUID to String(36)
   - Documented migration chain reordering (down_revision change)
   - Next steps: monitor Render deployment and verify health

**Context:**
This completes the migration fix cycle:
- Problem identified: Render deployment failing with FK type mismatch
- Root cause analyzed: Parallel migrations with incompatible FK types
- Fix applied: Updated d37ed4cd3013 to use String(36) for user FKs
- Fix deployed: Commit 3d15ca6 pushed, Render auto-deploy triggered
- Documentation complete: Full audit trail for future reference

Awaiting Render deployment verification.
